snippet: The journalists, Gianluigi Nuzzi and Emiliano Fittipaldi, used the documents for two books that detailed alleged incompetence and greed within the Vatican’s administrative body.
abstract: Vatican spokesman Rev Federico Lombardi announces investigation of journalists Gianluigi Nuzzi and Emiliano Fittipaldi, authors of books on fiscal mismanagement in Roman Catholic Church, for possible crimes connected to leaking of Vatican finances.
lead_paragraph: The journalists, Gianluigi Nuzzi and Emiliano Fittipaldi, used the documents for two books that detailed alleged incompetence and greed within the Vatican’s administrative body.

headline.main: Vatican Investigates 2 Journalists Over Leaked Documents
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; The Vatican: Leaks Prompt an Inquiry
